en-gb: Woman has been reported missing from her home
Officer sent to investigate and finds more information about the woman, and gets a recent photo
Photo uploaded to INSPEC2T app, a member of the public has informed local police she saw her on top of a bus stop
Officers locate the missing woman and take her to hospital for a checkup, she later returned home and is now safe
Officers search a larger area and eventually find the woman and return her to her home
Body has been found in a river and has been identified as the missing person
Reports of someone moving a wheelie bin
The 2 neighbours have started a verbal argument outside the property
Reported that one of the neighbours has assaulted the other outside the property
A man has been stabbed and is slumped next to the wheelie bin
Member of the public provides photographic evidence of man with a mechete using the INSPEC2T app
A citizen has informed the police that he saw which person assaulted the other
Issue dissolves itself and is no longer a problem
The officer has managed to stop the incident from developing, both neighbours have agreed to ignore the incident
The officer has calmed down the two neighbours and the verbal abuse stops
The officer manages to break up the fight and send the two neighbours on their way
Man has been left on the street until paramedics arrive, no arrests made, general public happiness decreases
Offender has been arrested by police after finding him in a shed nearby
Officers clean up and a man is arrested for the assault
Using citizen information, the officers manage to locate the man and arrest him
Report of a young female running through the city centre partially clothed and appears distressed.
Resolution due to delay in rape being reported vital evidence is lost no arrests made.
Officer eventually locates female who discloses that she has been raped.
Wait to start rape investigation leading to evidence being lost and although suspect arrested not enough evidence to secure a charge
Information allows officers to locate female quickly who discloses that she has been raped
Rape investigation conducted and offender identified and arrested
Report of a vehicle being parked in an inconsiderate manner on a residential street.
Patrol attends and finds that vehicle is not causing an obstruction & cannot do anything refers the matter to council parking services.
Information allows dispatch to determine that the matter is not a police one & issue is referred to council parking services.
Public are asking for police to dispatch officers to the location
Information allows dispatch to determine that the matter is not a police one & issue is referred to council parking services. However due to the delay in resolving matter confidence is lost.
Report of a disabled female in a wheelchair being verbally abused by a young male in the street, there are no cctv cameras in the area.
Due to lack of deployment not enough evidence can be obtained to identify & prosecute the offender
Officer attends and take statement from victim and witnesses. Using information suspect is identified
Arrest the suspect, using victim & witness statements suspect is successfully prosecuted
Suspect eventually arrested and successfully prosecuted at the cost of public confidence
Information allows officers to quickly identify the suspect who can be arrested a short distance away
Suspect is successfully prosecuted
Report of two homeless males fighting over a bottle of wine in the city centre.
Fight escalates resulting in one of the males smashing the bottle and stabbing the other.
Victim bleeds out & dies due to lack of deployment
Deploy officers, arrest the offender. Due to the severity of the injury a scene is identified and officers allocated to staff it awaiting CSI
Forensic evidence allows offender to be successfully prosecuted
Information allows officers to identify which of the males was the aggressor.
Officer attends and arrests aggressor thus preventing situation escalating, aggressor is successfully prosecuted
Officer attends and defuses the situation before it gets out of hand however unable to identify who was the aggressor. Both males warned and go their separate ways
Report from a drunk male stating that he has been assaulted inside a busy nightclub. Male refuses an ambulance as he is not seriously injured.
Drunk male becomes aggressive with doorstaff and tries picking a fight
Drunk male has started attacking a member of doorstaff
Deploy an officer, male is arrested for assault after attacking a member of doorstaff
Male is successfully prosecuted however still wants to report assault inside the club
Male reporting assault inside the club is unable to provide full information and no further arrests can be made
Deploy an officer male is arrested for drunk & disorderly however still wanting to report assault once sober in the morning
Due to drunken state male isnâ€™t able to provide full information and no arrests can be made
Drunk male becomes aggressive with officers which results in him being arrested, however he still wants to report assault once sober in the morning
Information allows officers to identify a suspect and make an arrest
Suspect is successfully prosecuted
Report of a group of 10-15 youths gathering outside a fast food restaurant causing a nuisance
Officer attends resolves current problem but fails to address long term issues.
Information leads to finding identity of youths and reason for them causing problems
Officer attends, resolves current issue & long term issues.
Nuisance escalates into criminal damage leading to window being smashed.
Groups behaviour escalates further & staff member gets assaulted whilst challenging them
Offenders identified and arrested
Due to time taken key evidence is lost meaning arrests cannot be made
Report of an elderly male being found in a confused state by staff on the train station.
Officer attend and discovers that male has been reported missing
Officer returns male to family address & submits reports
Male is eventually returned home however becomes increasingly distressed during the wait and requires officer to spend additional time calming him down
Officer calms down the elderly man who was distressed
Information obtained identify man as a missing person
Report of a collision between two vehicles on a busy road, report states that no persons are injured.
Report resolved without police deployment. Slight loss of happiness.
Officer attends no offences have taken place advices both parties to exchange details. Report resolved
Report of a collision involving two vehicles on a busy road, report is unable to give a specific junction & states that one of the drivers is complaining of neck pain.
Delay in reporting causes problems with congestion leading to several incidents of road rage.
Officers attend & closes part of the road and take details. One of the drivers smells of alcohol.
Driver successfully charged with drink driving.
1 driver arrested at scene
Driver eventually transported to custody, due to delay in driver getting into custody alcohol level reduced and driver released without being charged
Report of a shoplifter being detained by security staff at a large retailer
Male becomes aggressive and runs away from security, assaulting them in the process
Male eventually arrested and prosecuted for theft and assault
Due to delay in deployment key evidence is lost & prosecution no longer possible
Information reveals that shoplifter has never been in trouble previously and was issued a fixed penalty for the theft. Report concluded
Report of a drunken male causing problems inside a hotel foyer
Male soils himself and becomes abusive towards staff
Male identified as known individual who has caused similar problems
Male Removed from the premises without issue and returned to partner agencies to address long term issue
Male eventually arrested and prosecuted for public order
Male becomes violent towards staff and assualts one of them
Male arrested and charged with pulblic order & section 39 assault
Male makes off due to lack of response and unable to progress further as there is no CCTV
A report has been received regarding a small child who has been separated from their mother in a busy city centre shop
Officers begin searching the city centre shops for a child
Child is hit by a bus trying to cross a busy road
Picture of the child was circulated on the INSPEC2T platform and as such, the child was found nearby a shop. Mother and Child have been reunited
After much time used by your officers, mother and child have been reunited
Report received regarding a large amount of noise coming from a neighbouring property. The informant says to the call taker that if the police doesn't sort it, they'll do it themselves
Officers attend and ask the problematic property to turn the music down
Due to the delay in responding, the informant goes to the problematic address and confronts the occupants, which results in the informant getting assaulted
Offender arrested for assault and noise has been turned down
Informant reacts to the assault and smashes a window due to frustration of having to wait
Numerous officers deployed resulting in 2 arrests being made and music being turned down
Due to lack of deployment a serious assault occurs due to increasing tensions
Report of a group of youths causing havoc on a small residential estate. The report can only describe the youths as the usual ones
On arrival, the youths who have their faces concealed, run away.
Issue subsides without police intervention. The community are very unhappy with the lack of response and no long term solution
Information provided from a neighbour gives the identity of several of the youths
Officer deals with incident and is able to provide high quality evidence toward court orders to prevent future issues
Issues subside without police intervention, the community are unhappy but with help from citizens some evidence came forward and court orders are obtained

Report regarding concerns for the welfare of a family member who is elderly and lives on their own and not answering the telephone. Informant lives in another part of the country and is unable to visit them
Officer discovers elderly person has fallen inside the property and cannot get up but requires assistance in gaining entry to help them
Due to lack of deployment the elderly person has had to be admitted to hospital for a fall in the house. The community are not happy with this outcome
Request locates a close friend that the informant is not aware of. The friend confirms that the elderly family member is safe and well but has broken their phone.
Patrols gain entry and help the elderly person get medical assistance.
The condition of the elderly person deteriorates and requires considerably more medical assistance

Report received that there are a group of males fighting outside a shop on a residential estate with weapons. The informant is unable to provide any ID or further information on the weapons as they're driving past
Officers attend and makes several arrests and the community are satisfied, however, as specifics regarding which weapons were being used an officer is hurt
Citizen gives names of males involved and provides specifics of weapons being used
Due to lack of deployment, one of the males fighting is critically injured, resulting in community outrage
Officers deal with the incident by making several arrests without any significant harm to officers or the public

Report received regarding a transit van driving recklessly and at high speeds around a residential area. There is significant concern as a local primary school is due to finish for the day and pupils will be walking home
Due to lack of deployment the behaviour of the driver becomes more reckless, serveral other calls are received which provide direction of travel
Information is gathered about the travel direction and number plate of the vehicle
A vehicle matching the description is found abandoned nearby. However without a registration it's not possible to confirm that this is the vehicle.
Vehicle is involved in a high speed collision with a child crossing the road
Vehicle stopped near home address. Driver is found to be under the infulence of alcohol and arrested.
Patrols deal with collision, it comes to light that the friver is under the influence of alcohol is arrested. The chile receives meddical assistance
Driver does not wait and drives off, focusing on the wellbeing of the child, nobody takes note of the registration of the vehicle, no further action can be taken
Report received that there is a dangerous dog out of control in a local park. Nearby there is a play area which is currently very busy
Due to the delay in finding the dog, a further report in made that a dog has bitten a small child in the play area and ran away
Information provided on the location of the dog and the person who is believed to be the owner
No one is able to provide any information regarding the dog or its owner.
Park is searched but no one is able to provide any more information regarding the dog or its owner, and so, is not located
Park is searched, but the dog is not found, however, due to the owner information being known, officers go to the address and advise owner on controlling their dog in the future
